tr.td: St. Lawrence wins the opening coing toss and defers to the second half
WPI will receive the opening kickoff and defend the north goal
Daly Hebert kickoff 63 yards to the WPI02, Sean Murphy return 26 yards to the WPI28 (Scott Arens).
